Blog

Top 5 Commencement Speeches

Conan O'Brien

Conan is my comic idol and he delivers this awesome speech soon after his departure from NBC.

David Foster Wallace

Only audio - David Foster Wallace beautifully articulates my philosiphy on life. Every teacher should be required to listen to this.

Andy Sandberg

I’ve been a fan of TLI since the beginning. Not much wisdom here, just someone with my sense of humor.

Steve Jobs

One of Steve’s most insprirational speeches. This video played a large role convincing me to leave my first full-time job.

Jon Lovett

One of Obama’s speech/joke writers.

June 3, 2013
